name: Trashmasher
description:
Someone's got to clean up this city! 
Trash is being dumped at an alarming rate. The city will soon become a towering mountain of garbage unless you can stop it. Help clean up the city, but be careful - perilous dangers await.

Enjoy the latest exciting title from Earbeard Games! Credits:
  • Game Designer - Howard Hogan
  • Art Lead - Cora Stephens
  • Audio Lead - Eric Berzins
  • Composer - Jose Jimenez Filomeno
  • Sound Designers - Ricardo Rojas,
    Juan Zea-Aristizabal
